snippet: Islamist militants bombarded an army encampment near the city of Zinjibar in southern Yemen on Sunday, and dozens of soldiers and militants were reported killed.
abstract: Islamist militants bombard army encampment near the city of Zinjibar in southern Yemen, reportedly killing dozens of soldiers and militants; attack underscores profound security challenges facing new Yemeni Pres Abdu Rabbu Mansour Hadi.
lead_paragraph: Islamist militants bombarded an army encampment near the city of Zinjibar in southern Yemen on Sunday, and dozens of soldiers and militants were reported killed.

headline.main: Dozens of Yemeni Soldiers Reported Dead in Militant Attack
headline.print_headline: Dozens Killed By Militants In Yemen

keywords.value: Al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula
keywords.name: organizations
